group_1.textRight: I think I am okay with the handling part.@I will start fishing now.

group_1.textLeft: You did your best.
You look pretty disheartened, though...@Are you okay...?

group_1.textRight: I-I am perfectly fine.

group_1.textLeft: Even if you catch the fish you're lookin' for,@you gonna be able to handle it by yourself?

group_1.textRight: I-I've practiced enough, I'm okay.@I am a quick learner.
I would rather not waste anymore time@and get to fishing.

group_1.textCenter: I cannot catch a single thing!
Those using live bait are catching fish@so efficiently.
I'm drenched in sweat, but I have yet to@catch anything by casting...
I am so miserable... I am embarassed@by how desperate I feel.

group_1.textRight: Come on now, sometimes ya gotta@just throw all your pride out.

group_1.textLeft: Y-you're right.
I must forget about my character and dignity.@Right now I must devote everything to my apology.
But I have no idea why I cannot@catch anything.

group_1.textRight: We haven't caught any of the fish@you've been looking for, either.
There are plenty of people@lure fishing here,
so there may be something fundamentally@wrong with your technique, Nayuta.
Is your lure not swimming well?

group_1.textLeft: That may be it...

group_1.textRight: Let me give it a try.

group_1.textLeft: Go ahead.

group_1.textRight: Ohhh, it does look like a fish swimming.
Chiharu, ya can't just reel a lure back in.
You gotta swing the rod around@so it's swimming.

group_1.textLeft: Ehh, but doesn't it already look like@it's swimming well?
See, it's bobbing around.

group_1.textRight: ...So it is.

group_1.textLeft: Eh?! You cannot just reel it in...
Hold on!
This river must have a strong current,@then?

group_1.textRight: Yes, it does. It was raining yesterday.
They have been releasing fish in,@but really it's just the river.
And compared to the last few days,@the weather has been getting nicer...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:103701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!@[wait:0.8][chara:103701:cheek_0][chara:103701:lipSynch_1]That is it!
When the current is strong and the weather@improves, the air pressure starts to rise,
and it becomes an oddity to see@small fish on the surface.

group_1.textRight: Then the fish know the lure's a fake?
The fishies are wise...

group_1.textLeft: It's a shame I have lost a battle@of wits with fish,
but I know how to resolve this.
With this... I will change to a sinking lure...!

group_1.textRight: [chara:304701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textLeft: No way...
[chara:103701:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I did iiit!! I caught it!

group_1.textRight: Yeah!

group_1.textLeft: On top of that, it is the fish I wanted!

group_1.textRight: Then you've achieved your goal!@Congrats!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you very much!@This is thanks to all of you.

group_1.textRight: I'm glad I got to play the role of a person...
...that helps the detective stuck on a case by@just...casually mentioning something as a hint!

group_1.textLeft: And you, too, Miss Aoba - thank you for@guiding me on how to handle the fish.

group_1.textRight: Sure! Congratulations to you.@The fish are so mortified!

group_1.textLeft: Ah, there was no need to tell me@what the fish are saying...

group_1.textRight: You still good on time?@Weren't you gonna sneak off and cook?

group_1.textLeft: That's right! I still need to get home.
Well, everyone, I am extremely grateful@to you all.

group_1.textRight: You can do it!

group_1.textLeft: I certainly will!
